class.name: TokenQuery
class.description: The TokenQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching tokens from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by contract addresses, token IDs, and attributes.

method.name: attribute_filter
method.description: Adds an attribute filter to the query.

method.name: contract_addresses
method.description: Sets the contract addresses to filter by.

method.name: token_ids
method.description: Sets the token IDs to filter by.
